title: mintab
desc: Mintab is a customisable homepage for your browser, providing quick access to bookmarked sites. Every display component is customised through a settings drawer built with Chakra UI. User settings are managed through state and context, and then stored in localStorage to persist through page refreshes.

title: game grid
desc: Game Grid is an e-commerce site and directory of free-to-play games. Data is pulled from the 'freetogame' API and displayed through various pages using React Router. Clicking on a game displays additional information within its own dynamic route. Games can also be searched for and filtered by genre.

title: pomodoro
desc: Audiophile is an e-commerce site focused on audio related products. The design was provided by Frontend Mentor and built with Tailwind CSS. Product data is stored in a json file and displayed on the corresponding product pages. A cart system is also present, using the React Context API which persists cart information within localStorage between page refreshes.
